message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its high value and unique features, it is worth $12,000 to me. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I am extending this offer to you at a price that reflects its true value while ensuring a fair deal for both parties. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing the product for $9,500. This price not only allows you to benefit from the product's exceptional quality but also secures a transaction that maximizes my earnings. I look forward to your positive response.
